body_html: The error message is confusing, because it looks like it almost finds the file since it looks in /usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib but the header file is in fact in /usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/include.
body_text: The error message is confusing, because it looks like it almost finds the file since it looks in /usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib but the header file is in fact in /usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/include.
body: The error message is confusing, because it looks like it almost finds the file since it looks in `/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib` but the header file is in fact in `/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/include`.
